name: Hive Five (rsvp asap)
description:
***  HTML5 Version currently does not show hit-flash  ***

The spiders have come and stolen the Hive Five, our kingdom's Crown Jewels. Get them back to save the hive! 

Move: Arrows

Jump: Z (twice to double jump)

Sword: X

Shield: C

Made in <2 weeks for LOWREZJAM2020! 

Art & Programming: J. Omar & rsvp asap

Sounds :Juhani Junkala & TheOuterLinux
